rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with Art Deco motifs and polished marble flooring, incorporating Vastu principles of energy flow.
Large living area with geometric patterns typical of Art Deco style, optimal placement to catch sunlight as per Vastu norms.
Elegant dining room aligned to the east for positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco detailing and efficient layout; positioned near water source as per local norms.
Functional bathroom located conveniently near the living area.
Cozy guest room with Vastu-compliant north-east orientation for calm energy.
Dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves and Art Deco elements; positioned in the west or south-west corner to encourage concentration.
Utility area for storage of household items, following local building norms.
